arts.ttl: Sunday’s briefing: Man City slip up and Dele Alli sees red on football return
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola’s side twice let a lead slip in Saturday’s draw with Brighton, while Dele Alli was sent off less than 10 minutes into his Como debut.

arts.ttl: Furious Cesc Fabregas points finger after Dele Alli sent off 10 minutes into debut
arts.sum: Former Tottenham Hotspur and Everton star Dele Alli made his long-awaited Como debut away to AC Milan but lasted just 10 minutes before being shown a straight red card

arts.sum: Milan defender Kyle Walker tried to talk the referee out of giving opponent Dele Alli...

arts.ttl: Pulisic: ‘Milan have faith in me, I want to continue here’
arts.sum: Christian Pulisic confirms he feels at home with Milan and ‘I want to continue here’...

arts.ttl: Cesc Fabregas slams Dele Alli after red card 10 minutes into first appearance in over two years on Como debut
arts.sum: Midfielder saw red for a clumsy challenge on former England team-mate Ruben Loftus-Cheek

arts.ttl: Dele Alli sent off just 10 minutes into his first match in over two years
arts.sum: Dele Alli has endured notable struggles in the last few years after falling out of favour at both Tottenham and Everton - but he was handed a lifeline in January when he signed for Serie A side Como

arts.ttl: Reijnders begs Milan fans for positive energy, Abraham a ‘team player’

arts.ttl: Dele Alli sent off minutes into Como debut
arts.sum: Dele Alli's first professional football match in 748 days lasted just nine minutes as he was shown a straight red card for a foul on Ruben Loftus-Cheek.

arts.ttl: Fabregas: ‘Como happy to lose like this, but Dele Alli grave mistake’
